headline: Hess CEO Open to FTC Appeal Over Chevron Board Ban Next Year
summary: Hess CEO John Hess said he may fight the FTC's restriction on joining Chevron's board under the Trump government

headline: Big Oil Pours Billions into Biofuel Production to Meet Decarbonization Goals
summary: Oil and gas giants are investing heavily in biofuels like HVO and SAF as part of their decarbonization strategies, with a focus on greenfield developments, co-processing, and refinery conversions.

raw.headline: Big Oil Pours Billions into Biofuel Production to Meet Decarbonization Goals

headline: Petrobras Q3 Earnings Beat Despite a Decline in Production
summary: As of Sept. 30, 2024, PBR has recorded a net debt of $44,251 million. The company ends the quarter with cash and cash equivalents of$8,694 million.

headline: XLE: Trump SPR Refill And Geopolitical Risk Point To Oil Rally In 2025
summary: Since most Energy Select Sector Fund constituents are focused on the NA oil market, upside is possible if Asian oil export capacity is harmed due to war. Learn more on XLE ETF here.
